artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,398); at left is a two tone urn with animal heads at the spigot and at the four corners of the base; in the center is a man holding a walking stick in yellow breeches, a brick red coat, and a black hat; on the right is a woman holding a green fan in a white and blue gown with a blue hat with white fabric tied in a bow at the back of the hat and white plumes at the front
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Seizième Cahier, 1 Mai 1789
